name: test_e2e_with_logs[558_AUTH_DOT_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `AUTH_DOT_001` |
| **Name** | Dot segment path bypass |
| **Category** | AUTH_BYPASS |
| **Subcategory** | dot_segment |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/admin/./`
- **Encoded**: `%2Fadmin%2F.%2F`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~4000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:55.000 UTC

|------|-------|

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
